Text: Important Registration InformationHi Larry Welcome to Classmates the worlds best place to reunite with friends from kindergarten through college Here is your access information Please print this email for your records Registration Number Password michael Registration email If you havent already done so we invite you to become a Gold member today for exclusive privileges and to contact anyone in any of Classmates directories Gold membership just US for a full year also entitles you to an immediate member benefit of an entire year with Classmates Travel Values FREE Save off hotel rates at nearly popular hotels like participating Marriott Hyatt Ramada Days Inn and more Plus you get up to US in Airline Discounts and much more Get the most of Classmates membership become a Gold member today goeCFCM Every day thousands of people get back in touch through our community of million members We recently added nearly schools making Classmates the very best place to find your old friends lost loves and military buddies Be the first in your class to sign up in our new K and college directories And check back often with new people signing up every day chances are youll find who youre looking for at Classmates
